mapper.select: select trunc(d.datadate, 'dd') datadate,e.ele_type_id element_code, e.ele_type_desc element_desc sum(case when e.val_type between 10 and 19 then d.cou_amt else d.avg_amt end) amount from dat_day d inner join bas_checkpoint_element ce on ce.cp_elem_id = d.cp_elem_id inner join bas_element e on e.ele_type_id = ce.ele_type_id inner join bas_checkpoint c on ce.collect_id = ce.collect_id where d.datadate >= to_date(#{startDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and d.datadate < to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd') and c.source_id = #{sourceId} and c.is_deleted = 0 and ce.is_deleted = 0 group by trunc(d.datadate, 'dd'), e.ele_type_id, e.ele_type_desc, e.val_type

select count(1) from (select trunc(d.datadate, 'dd') datadate,e.ele_type_id, e.ele_type_desc, sum(case when e.val_type between 10 and 19 then d.cou_amt else d.avg_amt end) amount from dat_day d inner join bas_checkpoint_element ce on ce.cp_elem_id = d.cp_elem_id inner join bas_element e on e.ele_type_id = ce.ele_type_id inner join bas_checkpoint c on ce.collect_id = ce.collect_id where d.datadate >= to_date(#{startDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and d.datadate <= to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd') and c.source_id = #{sourceId} and c.is_deleted = 0 and ce.is_deleted = 0) group by trunc(d.datadate, 'dd'), e.ele_type_id, e.ele_type_desc, e.val_type

select d.datadate,e.ele_type_id element_code,e.ele_type_desc element_desc,d.amount from bas_checkpoint c inner join bas_checkpoint_element ce on ce.collect_id = c.collect_id inner join bas_element e on ce.ele_type_id = e.ele_type_id inner join dat_latest d on d.cp_elem_id = ce.cp_elem_id and d.datatype = 1 where c.source_id = #{sourceId} and c.is_deleted = 0 and ce.is_deleted = 0

select count(1) from (select d.datadate,ce.element_code,ce.element_desc,d.amount from bas_checkpoint c inner join bas_checkpoint_element ce on ce.collect_id = c.collect_id inner join dat_second d on d.cp_elem_id = ce.cp_elem_id where d.datadate >= to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and d.datadate < to_date(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and c.source_id =#{sourceId} and c.is_deleted = 0 and ce.is_deleted = 0)
select full_name fullName from basecenter.pf_bas_source where source_id=#{sourceId} and is_deleted=0

select distinct e.ele_type_id dataIndex,e.ele_type_desc || '(' || e.unit || ')' title from bas_checkpoint c inner join bas_checkpoint_element ce on ce.collect_id = c.collect_id inner join bas_element e on ce.ele_type_id = e.ele_type_id where c.source_id =#{sourceId} and ce.is_deleted = 0 and c.is_deleted = 0

select d.datadate,ce.cp_elem_id element_code,ce.element_desc,d.amount,o.outlet_name from bas_checkpoint c inner join bas_checkpoint_element ce on ce.collect_id = c.collect_id inner join bas_outlet o on o.outlet_id = ce.outlet_id and o.is_deleted = 0 inner join dat_second d on d.cp_elem_id = ce.cp_elem_id where d.datadate >= to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and d.datadate < to_date(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and c.source_id =#{sourceId} and c.is_deleted = 0 and ce.is_deleted = 0
and o.outlet_id = #{outletId}

select d.datadate,ce.cp_elem_id element_code,ce.element_desc, case when e.val_type between 10 and 19 then d.cou_amt else d.avg_amt end amount, o.outlet_name from bas_checkpoint c inner join bas_checkpoint_element ce on ce.collect_id = c.collect_id inner join bas_outlet o on o.outlet_id = ce.outlet_id and o.is_deleted = 0 inner join bas_element e on ce.ele_type_id = e.ele_type_id inner join dat_day d on d.cp_elem_id = ce.cp_elem_id where d.datadate >=to_date(#{startDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and d.datadate <= to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd') and c.source_id = #{sourceId} and c.is_deleted = 0 and ce.is_deleted = 0
and o.outlet_id = #{outletId}

select d.datadate,ce.cp_elem_id element_code,ce.element_desc, case when e.val_type between 10 and 19 then d.cou_amt else d.avg_amt end amount, o.outlet_name from bas_checkpoint c inner join bas_checkpoint_element ce on ce.collect_id = c.collect_id inner join bas_outlet o on o.outlet_id = ce.outlet_id and o.is_deleted = 0 inner join bas_element e on ce.ele_type_id = e.ele_type_id inner join dat_hour d on d.cp_elem_id = ce.cp_elem_id where d.datadate >=to_date(#{startDate}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and d.datadate < to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-MM-dd') and c.source_id = #{sourceId} and c.is_deleted = 0 and ce.is_deleted = 0
and o.outlet_id = #{outletId}

select d.datadate,ce.cp_elem_id element_code,ce.element_desc, case when e.val_type between 10 and 19 then d.cou_amt else d.avg_amt end amount, o.outlet_name from bas_checkpoint c inner join bas_checkpoint_element ce on ce.collect_id = c.collect_id inner join bas_outlet o on o.outlet_id = ce.outlet_id and o.is_deleted = 0 inner join bas_element e on ce.ele_type_id = e.ele_type_id inner join dat_minute d on d.cp_elem_id = ce.cp_elem_id where d.datadate >= to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy-MM-dd') and d.datadate < to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-MM-dd') and c.source_id =#{sourceId} and c.is_deleted = 0 and ce.is_deleted = 0
and o.outlet_id = #{outletId}

select d.datadate,e.ele_type_id element_code,e.ele_type_desc element_desc, sum(case when e.val_type between 10 and 19 then d.cou_amt else d.avg_amt end) amount from bas_checkpoint c inner join bas_checkpoint_element ce on ce.collect_id = c.collect_id inner join bas_element e on ce.ele_type_id = e.ele_type_id inner join dat_hour d on d.cp_elem_id = ce.cp_elem_id where d.datadate >=to_date(#{startDate}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and d.datadate < to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-MM-dd') and c.source_id = #{sourceId} and c.is_deleted = 0 and ce.is_deleted = 0 group by d.datadate, e.ele_type_id, e.ele_type_desc

select d.datadate,e.ele_type_id element_code,e.ele_type_desc element_desc, sum(case when e.val_type between 10 and 19 then d.cou_amt else d.avg_amt end) amount from bas_checkpoint c inner join bas_checkpoint_element ce on ce.collect_id = c.collect_id inner join bas_element e on ce.ele_type_id = e.ele_type_id inner join dat_day d on d.cp_elem_id = ce.cp_elem_id where d.datadate >=to_date(#{startDate}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and d.datadate < to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-MM-dd') and c.source_id = #{sourceId} and c.is_deleted = 0 and ce.is_deleted = 0 group by d.datadate, e.ele_type_id, e.ele_type_desc

select 'real' dataIndex,'实时传输率' title from dual union all select 'day' dataIndex,'日传输率' title from dual union all select 'hour' dataIndex,'小时传输率' title from dual union all select 'minute' dataIndex,'分钟传输率' title from dual

select t.datadate,'real' element_code,round(avg(d.realcnt/28.8),2)amount from ( select trunc(sysdate, 'dd') - 31 + rownum datadate from dual connect by rownum <= 30 ) t left join dat_completerate d on d.datadate = t.datadate left join bas_checkpoint_element ce on ce.cp_elem_id = d.cp_elem_id left join bas_checkpoint c on c.collect_id = ce.collect_id where ce.is_deleted = 0 and c.is_deleted = 0 and c.source_id = #{sourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by t.datadate union all select t.datadate,'day' element_code,round(avg(daycnt/0.01), 2)amount from ( select trunc(sysdate, 'dd') - 31 + rownum datadate from dual connect by rownum <= 30 ) t left join dat_completerate d on d.datadate = t.datadate left join bas_checkpoint_element ce on ce.cp_elem_id = d.cp_elem_id left join bas_checkpoint c on c.collect_id = ce.collect_id where ce.is_deleted = 0 and c.is_deleted = 0 and c.source_id = #{sourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by t.datadate union all select t.datadate,'hour' element_code,round(avg(hourcnt/0.24), 2)amount from ( select trunc(sysdate, 'dd') - 31 + rownum datadate from dual connect by rownum <= 30 ) t left join dat_completerate d on d.datadate = t.datadate left join bas_checkpoint_element ce on ce.cp_elem_id = d.cp_elem_id left join bas_checkpoint c on c.collect_id = ce.collect_id where ce.is_deleted = 0 and c.is_deleted = 0 and c.source_id = #{sourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by t.datadate union all select t.datadate,'minute' element_code,round(avg(minucnt/1.44), 2)amount from ( select trunc(sysdate, 'dd') - 31 + rownum datadate from dual connect by rownum <= 30 ) t left join dat_completerate d on d.datadate = t.datadate left join bas_checkpoint_element ce on ce.cp_elem_id = d.cp_elem_id left join bas_checkpoint c on c.collect_id = ce.collect_id where ce.is_deleted = 0 and c.is_deleted = 0 and c.source_id = #{sourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by t.datadate

select * from ( select distinct e.ele_type_id dataIndex,e.ele_type_desc title,e.orderby from bas_checkpoint_element ce left join bas_element e on e.ele_type_id = ce.ele_type_id left join bas_checkpoint c on c.collect_id = ce.collect_id where c.source_id = #{sourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ce.is_deleted = 0 and c.is_deleted = 0 union all select 'total' ele_type_id, '总传输率' ele_type_desc, 9999 from dual ) order by orderby

select t.datadate,ce.ele_type_id element_code,round(avg(d.realcnt/28.8),2)amount from ( select trunc(sysdate, 'dd') - 31 + rownum datadate from dual connect by rownum <= 30 ) t left join dat_completerate d on d.datadate = t.datadate left join bas_checkpoint_element ce on ce.cp_elem_id = d.cp_elem_id left join bas_checkpoint c on c.collect_id = ce.collect_id where ce.is_deleted = 0 and c.is_deleted = 0 and c.source_id = #{sourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by t.datadate, ce.ele_type_id union all select t.datadate,'total' element_code,round(avg(d.realcnt/28.8),2)amount from ( select trunc(sysdate, 'dd') - 31 + rownum datadate from dual connect by rownum <= 30 ) t left join dat_completerate d on d.datadate = t.datadate left join bas_checkpoint_element ce on ce.cp_elem_id = d.cp_elem_id left join bas_checkpoint c on c.collect_id = ce.collect_id where ce.is_deleted = 0 and c.is_deleted = 0 and c.source_id = #{sourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by t.datadate

select t.datadate,ce.ele_type_id element_code,round(avg(daycnt/0.01), 2)amount from ( select trunc(sysdate, 'dd') - 31 + rownum datadate from dual connect by rownum <= 30 ) t left join dat_completerate d on d.datadate = t.datadate left join bas_checkpoint_element ce on ce.cp_elem_id = d.cp_elem_id left join bas_checkpoint c on c.collect_id = ce.collect_id where ce.is_deleted = 0 and c.is_deleted = 0 and c.source_id = #{sourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by t.datadate, ce.ele_type_id union all select t.datadate,'total' element_code,round(avg(daycnt/0.01), 2)amount from ( select trunc(sysdate, 'dd') - 31 + rownum datadate from dual connect by rownum <= 30 ) t left join dat_completerate d on d.datadate = t.datadate left join bas_checkpoint_element ce on ce.cp_elem_id = d.cp_elem_id left join bas_checkpoint c on c.collect_id = ce.collect_id where ce.is_deleted = 0 and c.is_deleted = 0 and c.source_id = #{sourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by t.datadate

select t.datadate,ce.ele_type_id element_code,round(avg(hourcnt/0.24), 2)amount from ( select trunc(sysdate, 'dd') - 31 + rownum datadate from dual connect by rownum <= 30 ) t left join dat_completerate d on d.datadate = t.datadate left join bas_checkpoint_element ce on ce.cp_elem_id = d.cp_elem_id left join bas_checkpoint c on c.collect_id = ce.collect_id where ce.is_deleted = 0 and c.is_deleted = 0 and c.source_id = #{sourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by t.datadate, ce.ele_type_id union all select t.datadate,'total' element_code,round(avg(hourcnt/0.24), 2)amount from ( select trunc(sysdate, 'dd') - 31 + rownum datadate from dual connect by rownum <= 30 ) t left join dat_completerate d on d.datadate = t.datadate left join bas_checkpoint_element ce on ce.cp_elem_id = d.cp_elem_id left join bas_checkpoint c on c.collect_id = ce.collect_id where ce.is_deleted = 0 and c.is_deleted = 0 and c.source_id = #{sourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by t.datadate

select t.datadate,ce.ele_type_id element_code,round(avg(minucnt/1.44), 2)amount from ( select trunc(sysdate, 'dd') - 31 + rownum datadate from dual connect by rownum <= 30 ) t left join dat_completerate d on d.datadate = t.datadate left join bas_checkpoint_element ce on ce.cp_elem_id = d.cp_elem_id left join bas_checkpoint c on c.collect_id = ce.collect_id where ce.is_deleted = 0 and c.is_deleted = 0 and c.source_id = #{sourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by t.datadate, ce.ele_type_id union all select t.datadate,'total' element_code,round(avg(minucnt/1.44), 2)amount from ( select trunc(sysdate, 'dd') - 31 + rownum datadate from dual connect by rownum <= 30 ) t left join dat_completerate d on d.datadate = t.datadate left join bas_checkpoint_element ce on ce.cp_elem_id = d.cp_elem_id left join bas_checkpoint c on c.collect_id = ce.collect_id where ce.is_deleted = 0 and c.is_deleted = 0 and c.source_id = #{sourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by t.datadate
